short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Minimalist Homepage & New Tab For Writing Your Motivations And Plan As Sticky Notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple & Clean: A minimalist new tab extension designed to keep your motivations and plans organized.

Sticky Notes for Your Goals: Easily add, edit, and remove motivational notes, daily plans, or to-do lists right on your homepage.

Stay Organized: Keep your most important tasks and inspirations visible, so you never lose sight of your priorities.
